name: Ever, In Time
description:
Play as Ever, Skye and Constance - 3 friends fleeing the corporate offices of Tonic - a cosmetics company that will stop at nothing to successfully develop a product that guarantees eternal youth, and a rejuvenated life.

This game was brainstormed and developed in 20 days, and it is my entry into the IGMC Game Jam 2022 - fitting the theme: Rebirth/Rejuvenation/Resurrection. 

  • Turn-based RPG with a strong emphasis on storytelling.
  • Discover Ever's true power, and use it to solve puzzles.
  • Slick Pixel Art from finalbossblues.
  • Punchy, wonderful music by s0nderlust.
  • Sweet boss theme by Nile the Nightmare.

Controls 🎮

🏃‍♀️     Movement:            ← → ↓ ↑ or W, A, S, D
🔍    Interact:                 Z, SPACE or ENTER
📝    Menu/Cancel:       X or ESC
⏱️     Rewind Time:       TAB

An introduction to a bigger RPG I'll very likely remake in the near future. I do hope you enjoy it. If you have any feedback, drop a comment below.

To play: Unzip, and inside the 'Ever in Time' folder, run 'Game'.
